body.p:
You can use one of the Create Release Notes action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Marketing category to ask the AI Positron to create release notes from a selection in an opened document.

The AI action Create release notes is immensely useful to end users as it provides a concise and comprehensive summary of the latest updates, improvements, and bug fixes in a specific content or software release. With this action, users can quickly understand what changes have been made, allowing them to stay informed and up-to-date with the latest features and enhancements. It saves users time and effort by eliminating the need to manually sift through lengthy documentation or changelogs. Whether it's a software update, a website release, or a content update, the Create release notes AI action ensures that users can easily grasp the key information and make the most of the latest changes.
Select the content in the code block below containing issue IDs and titles and invoke the Create Release Notes action.
